title: REWORK AATROX!????
body:
hi guys, I'm aatrox user in Oceania server.
I got this 7.5 patch and play new aatrox(?)..
Riot told make him very good, but
When I tried him, I felt he was weaker than before ..
especially his passive..
passive cd down is good but,
when he was in fight, too short to using and holding it,
and not like before can't keep holding that passive and WHAT's that revival with condition passive.
like tryn can ult all the time with fight as monster,
before rework aatrox can fight as monster fight with passive when passive is on,
but now!
It can't be happen.
I think Riot did some mistake with passive.
if they wanna make him more useful and good fighter, they shouldn't touched passive.
it made him more useless now.
if any Riot step see this, I'm really appreciate to you guys for another skill rework(especially skill E with AD dmg)
but, passive is so annoying and useless.
I hope you guys do something ASAP.
At least you guys do his passive revival return like before.
Aatrox play's point is how much keep using well with vampire and passive.
this patched passive is really worse.
I gonna try more, but I don't think my opinion change.
I guess many(?) people thought same with me who playing Aatrox.
You guys doing very good job with yorick,
but why Aatrox.... sigh
anyway Thanks for read until here.
and I hope something change again soon.
thanks, Regards,
One Aatrox user.

replies.body:
The current change is just a band-aid supposedly there to just let him get by (but maybe that does make him weaker than before, but I won't know, I don't play the man), so it's not his rework. His real rework would come a bit later along with the collective "diver's update" that's scheduled for some time in 2018 I think.

So yeah, it's happening, sit tight and get ready. Hopefully it would be a glorious day for our demon warlord.

But unlike trydermere who can go in for 5 seconds without worrying about dying. Aatrox goes in and just dies

Yah can confirm he is still trash. Hopefully they wont fuck it up when they full scale rework him...
